meanings.definition: To fill with great joy or delight.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's playful antics overjoys the children.
meanings.sent3: The clown's silly dance overjoys the audience.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful sunset overjoys the nature lovers.
meanings.sent5: Winning the championship overjoys the team beyond words.

meanings.definition: To cause to feel great happiness or pleasure.
meanings.sent2: The delicious cake overjoys everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected snow day overjoys the students.
meanings.sent4: The heartfelt apology overjoys the hurt friend.
meanings.sent5: The long-awaited vacation overjoys the tired travelers.
